author: Ben Marth
title: Wednesday's Area Scores - October 7
text:
Wednesday's Area Scores - October 7 - WGEM.com: Quincy News, Weather, Sports, and Radio Member Center: Wednesday's Area Scores - October 7 Posted: For the second time this season QND used a Cole Hayes goal and Lucas Cline in net to defeat QHS 1-0. 
**High School Soccer, Boys**- Raiders sweep regular season series**High School Golf, Girls***Class A QND Regional, at Spring Lake CC* 1) Macomb: 430 - all three teams advance to Monday's Rochester sectional - Medalist - Allison Torrance (Macomb): 89 3) Lauren Hawley (Pittsfield): 93*Top Central Individuals*Morgan Totsch (Illini West): 91Abbie Thompson (Southeastern): 97Channing Davis (West Central): 107Grace Frese (QND): 114- Quincy High (445) finishes in 6th place, fails to advance- Krystal Burgtorf (92) and Hannah Maguire (115) advance to Monday's Normal Community Sectional as individuals**High School Softball***Class 3 District 8 Quarterfinals*Hannibal: 5- Kirksville vs. Macon, Thursday 5 p.m.*Class 2 District 12 Quarterfinals*Mark Twain: 1- South Shelby vs. Monroe City, Thursday 5 p.m.Palmyra: 2
